info.task: operate a switch in the on state
info.title: Operate a switch in the on state

setupScript.name: setFocusOnAndTurnOnSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Notifications' switch, and sets its state to 'on'

user: With focus on the 'Notifications' switch, change its state to 'off'.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Notifications' switch, change its state to 'off'.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Change in state, to 'off', is conveyed
